instructions: Scan your barcode or download the Walgreens app. Download for Android . Tap Save to Google Pay .

Unlock your phone and hold it over the contactless payment terminal. Tap to apply your Balance Rewards card when prompted to enter your Balance Rewards number on the payment terminal. Tap again to pay.
Unlock your phone and hold it over the vending machine's card reader. Tap to apply your Coca-Cola vending pass and buy a drink.
Visit the Plus! website . Log in or register for your Plus! account. Tap Save to phone .
Unlock your phone and hold it over the contactless payment terminal. Earn and redeem LinkPoints in one tap at selected Plus! Partners. Tap again to pay wherever contactless payment is accepted.
